User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system.

isModerator.description: Indicates if the user has moderator privileges.

MoodEntry.title: Mood Entry
MoodEntry.description: Represents a single mood entry for a user.

value.description: A numerical representation of the mood (e.g., 1-5).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the mood was logged.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in the group chat.

userId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

userName.description: The display name of the user.

message.description: The content of the chat message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

isModerator.description: Whether the sending user is a moderator.

/userProfiles/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for a user.

/userProfiles/{userId}/moodEntries/{entr.description: Stores a user's mood entries over time.

/groupChatMessages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages for the anonymous peer-to-peer group chat.
